entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening then changing to a few rain showers near midnight. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
